TEMPLATE: Copy this structure to add a new artwork to artworks.json

EXAMPLE.title: Your Artwork Title
EXAMPLE.description: Short description shown in gallery (1-2 sentences)
EXAMPLE.fullDescription: Longer description shown in the modal when someone clicks on your artwork. Explain your process, inspiration, or techniques used.

INSTRUCTIONS.step1: Add your images to the appropriate folder (images/illustrations, images/graphic-design, or images/animation)
INSTRUCTIONS.step4: Update all fields with your artwork information
INSTRUCTIONS.step5: Add it to the correct category array in artworks.json
INSTRUCTIONS.step6: Make sure to use a unique ID number
INSTRUCTIONS.step7: Save the file and refresh your browser!

FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.id: Unique number for this artwork (make it different from all others)
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.title: The name of your artwork
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.description: Short version shown in gallery preview
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.fullDescription: Detailed description shown in modal - tell the story!
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.year: When it was created - must be '2025', '2024', or '2023' to appear in filters
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.mainImage: Path to the main/final artwork image
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.relatedImages: Array of progress/sketch images. Can be empty [] if you don't have any.
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.software: Programs you used. Can be empty [] or omit this field if you want.
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.timeSpent: How long it took. Optional - can be omitted.
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.dimensions: Image size/resolution. Optional - can be omitted.
FIELD_EXPLANATIONS.tags: Keywords for your art. Can be empty [] or omit this field.
